1 #include "KDLSolver.h"
2 #include "kdl/segment.hpp"
3 #include "kdl/frames.hpp"

5 KDLSolver::KDLSolver() {
6  n.param("robot_description", robot_desc_string, std::string());
7  if (!kdl_parser::treeFromString(robot_desc_string, kdlTree))
8  ROS_ERROR("Failed to construct kdl tree");
9 
10  KDL::Frame newSegment(KDL::Vector(0, 0, 0.1034));
11  kdlTree.addSegment(KDL::Segment("panda_EE", KDL::Joint(KDL::Joint::None), newSegment, KDL::RigidBodyInertia::Zero()), "panda_link8");
12 
13  for (KDL::SegmentMap::const_iterator seg = kdlTree.getSegments().begin(); seg != kdlTree.getSegments().end(); seg++)
14  {
15  if (seg->first.find("control_point") != std::string::npos)
16  {
17  controlPointCount++;
18  }
19  }
20 
21  kdlChainsControlPoints = std::make_unique<KDL::Chain[]>(controlPointCount + 1);
22  kdlChainsJoints = std::make_unique<KDL::Chain[]>(10); // 0 through 8 + ee
23 
24  kdlTree.getChain("panda_link0", "panda_EE", kdlChainsControlPoints[0]);
25  for (int i = 0; i < controlPointCount; i++)
26  {
27  kdlTree.getChain("panda_link0", std::string("control_point") + std::to_string(i), kdlChainsControlPoints[i+1]);
28  }
29 
30  for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++)
31  {
32  kdlTree.getChain("panda_link0", std::string("panda_link") + std::to_string(i), kdlChainsJoints[i]);
33  }
34  kdlTree.getChain("panda_link0", std::string("panda_EE"), kdlChainsJoints[9]);
35 
36 }

39 Eigen::MatrixXd KDLSolver::computeJacobian(std::string linkName, Eigen::VectorXd q)
40 {
41  // Read the element in the KDL chain array that needs to be indexed
42 
43  KDL::Chain kdlChain;
44  kdlTree.getChain("panda_link0", linkName, kdlChain);
45 
46  KDL::JntArray KDLJointArray(7);
47  KDLJointArray.data = q;
48  KDLJointArray.resize(kdlChain.getNrOfJoints());
49 
50  KDL::ChainJntToJacSolver JSolver = KDL::ChainJntToJacSolver(kdlChain);
51  KDL::Jacobian J;
52  J.resize(kdlChain.getNrOfJoints());
53 
54  JSolver.JntToJac(KDLJointArray, J);
55  return J.data;
56 }
57 
58 Eigen::MatrixXd KDLSolver::computeJacobian2(KDLSolver::closest_point& controlPoint, Eigen::VectorXd& q)
59 {
60  KDL::Chain kdlChain;
61  std::string linkNameA = std::string("panda_link") + std::to_string(controlPoint.segmentId);
62  Eigen::Vector3d ABin0 = controlPoint.t * (controlPoint.segmentPointB - controlPoint.segmentPointA);
63  kdlTree.getChain("panda_link0", linkNameA, kdlChain);
64  KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive FKSolver = KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive(kdlChain);
65  KDL::JntArray KDLJointArray(7); KDLJointArray.data = q; KDLJointArray.resize(kdlChain.getNrOfJoints());
66  KDL::Frame frame0A;
67  FKSolver.JntToCart(KDLJointArray, frame0A);
68  KDL::Frame newSegment(frame0A.M.Inverse() * KDL::Vector(ABin0.x(), ABin0.y(), ABin0.z()));
69  kdlChain.addSegment(KDL::Segment(KDL::Joint(KDL::Joint::None), newSegment, KDL::RigidBodyInertia::Zero()));
70  KDL::ChainJntToJacSolver JSolver = KDL::ChainJntToJacSolver(kdlChain);
71  KDL::Jacobian J; J.resize(kdlChain.getNrOfJoints());
72  JSolver.JntToJac(KDLJointArray, J);
73  return J.data;
74 }
75 
76 Eigen::Vector3d KDLSolver::forwardKinematicsControlPoints(std::string controlPointName, Eigen::VectorXd q)
77 {
78  int index{0};
79  if (controlPointName == "panda_EE")
80  {
81  index = 0;
82  }
83  else
84  {
85  index = std::stoi(controlPointName.substr(controlPointName.find_first_of("0123456789"), controlPointName.length() - 1)) + 1;
86  }
87 
88  KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive FKSolver = KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive(kdlChainsControlPoints[index]);
89  KDL::Frame controlPointFrame;
90  KDL::JntArray KDLJointArray(7); KDLJointArray.data = q; KDLJointArray.resize(kdlChainsControlPoints[index].getNrOfJoints());
91  FKSolver.JntToCart(KDLJointArray, controlPointFrame);
92  Eigen::Vector3d controlPointPositionVector;
93  controlPointPositionVector << controlPointFrame.p(0), controlPointFrame.p(1), controlPointFrame.p(2);
94  return controlPointPositionVector;
95 }
96 
97 Eigen::MatrixXd KDLSolver::forwardKinematicsJoints(const Eigen::VectorXd & q)
98 {
99  std::vector<int> jointNumbers = {2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 9};
100  Eigen::MatrixXd result(3,jointNumbers.size());
101  int index = 0;
102  for (auto &&i : jointNumbers)
103  {
104  KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive FKSolver = KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive(kdlChainsJoints[i]);
105  KDL::Frame kdlFrame;
106  KDL::JntArray KDLJointArray(7); KDLJointArray.data = q; KDLJointArray.resize(kdlChainsJoints[i].getNrOfJoints());
107  FKSolver.JntToCart(KDLJointArray, kdlFrame);
108  result.col(index++) << kdlFrame.p(0), kdlFrame.p(1), kdlFrame.p(2);
109  }
110 
111  return result;
112 }
113 
114 Eigen::Vector3d KDLSolver::forwardKinematics(KDLSolver::closest_point& controlPoint, Eigen::VectorXd& q)
115 {
116  KDL::Chain kdlChain;
117  std::string linkNameA = std::string("panda_link") + std::to_string(controlPoint.segmentId);
118  Eigen::Vector3d ABin0 = controlPoint.t * (controlPoint.segmentPointB - controlPoint.segmentPointA);
119  kdlTree.getChain("panda_link0", linkNameA, kdlChain);
120  KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive FKSolver = KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive(kdlChain);
121  KDL::JntArray KDLJointArray(7); KDLJointArray.data = q; KDLJointArray.resize(kdlChain.getNrOfJoints());
122  KDL::Frame frame0A;
123  FKSolver.JntToCart(KDLJointArray, frame0A);
124  KDL::Frame newSegment(frame0A.M.Inverse() * KDL::Vector(ABin0.x(), ABin0.y(), ABin0.z()));
125  kdlChain.addSegment(KDL::Segment(KDL::Joint(KDL::Joint::None), newSegment, KDL::RigidBodyInertia::Zero()));
126  KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive FKSolver2 = KDL::ChainFkSolverPos_recursive(kdlChain);
127  KDL::Frame finalFrame;
128  FKSolver2.JntToCart(KDLJointArray, finalFrame);
129  return Eigen::Vector3d(finalFrame.p(0), finalFrame.p(1), finalFrame.p(2));
130 }

134  return controlPointCount;
